text: I am deeply grateful to the centre directors and teachers at Playfacto Fusionopolis for their love, care, and unwavering supportâ€”not just for my children, but for me as well (yes, I definitely feel supported!). Playfacto Fusionopolis offers a nurturing, homely eorganizedt that fosters growth. They nurture my children's academic conscientiousness (daily spelling and tingxie grind!) while instilling strong values, ensuring they are happy and well-adjusted socially. It truly feels like an extension of home and family! My kids love the meals provided and the activities organized by the school. Any concerns are swiftly addressed. Thank you once again! I couldnâ€™t recommend you more!

My daughter really loves her time in Playfacto! The teachers are caring and nurturing, she always has many stories to share about her favourite teachers in Playfacto. The lunches there are also good, my daughter eats well there. Centre heads Cynthia and Serene are also very helpful and very prompt in their replies. We highly recommend Playfacto Fusionopolis ðŸ˜Š

My kids love this place! They met alot of great friends and teachers. Love the food provided from the centre.

The centre always provide prompt responses and it help me a lot.

They are a centre that goes extra miles to check on my kids and also provide them with solutions.

My son attended PlayFacto @ Fusionopolis for two years. PlayFacto created a comfortable environment for the children to rest, read and engage in various science / craft activities (alongside other enrichment boosters). The teachers were also very nurturing and caring about my son's development, both in terms of academics and character. I felt at ease with my son being there, knowing that he enjoyed himself and built great friendships!

Dear PlayFacto Teachers,

I want to express my heartfelt gratitude for your unwavering support and dedication to my child. Your passion for teaching and genuine care for each studentâ€™s well-being have created a nurturing environment where every child feels valued and inspired.

The way you tailor your teaching methods to cater to the individual needs of each student is truly commendable. My son has not only gained academic knowledge but also important life skills and values that he will carry forward. Your efforts have made a significant difference in his life and in our lives as well.

As today marks the last time my son will attend PlayFacto, I want to thank you for making his experience here so enriching and enjoyable. Your nurturing approach has helped him grow both academically and personally, fostering confidence and a love for learning.

Thank you for everything!
